name: OrigamiFacts
0:
”Alexa, open origami facts”
”Alexa, ask origami facts to amaze me”
”Alexa, ask origami facts to tell me something”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: origami facts
des:
Origami is one of the most indulging activities but have you ever thought about it on a big picture?
This skill is all set to delight you with some mind blowing origami facts you have never heard of.
Enable it and enjoy your adventurous ride with the art of paper folding.

Usage Instructions:
1) You can call it easily by saying "Alexa, open origami facts."
2)Couldn't hear the fact clearly? I have you covered, just say "Repeat."
3)Tired of speaking invocation name again and again? Worry not just say "Next."
4)Forget the instructions? Ready to help you always. Just say "help."

Note: Feel free to share opinions in comments to furnish up the skills ;-)
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
